Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix™ Automated Microbiology System - Amoxicillin (0.0313-32 µg/mL)
BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System Amoxicillin (0.0313-32 µg/mL) - Streptococcus ID/AST or AST
Regulation Name(s): Fully Automated Short-Term Incubation Cycle Antimicrobial Susceptibility Devices
Specimen Type(s): Pure culture isolates of Gram-negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria
Pure culture isolates of Gram-positive bacteria (Staphylococcus, Enterococcus, Streptococcus)
Streptococcus spp. (α- and β-hemolytic strains only)
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Automated identification and antimicrobial susceptibility testing
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix Automated Microbiology System with Amoxicillin panel for Streptococcus susceptibility testing
Indications for Use Summary: For in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by MIC of Gram-negative aerobic/facultative anaerobic and Gram-positive (Staphylococcus, Enterococcus, Streptococcus) bacteria from pure culture; specifically adds amoxicillin (0.0313-32 µg/mL) to Streptococcus ID/AST or AST panels
